alert.note: Alert for Hemphill; Lipscomb; Ochiltree; Roberts (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 21 at 8:41PM CDT until September 21 at 9:30PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Amarillo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Lipscomb County in the Panhandle of Texas... Northern Roberts County in the Panhandle of Texas... Northwestern Hemphill County in the Panhandle of Texas... Southeastern Ochiltree County in the Panhandle of Texas... * Until 930 PM CDT. * At 841 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 18 miles southeast of Spearman, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect some tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Lipscomb, Glazier, and Wolf Creek Park. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
